title: NoraSana
author: NoraSana
created_time: March 22, 2023, 07:51:50 AMLast edit: March 22, 2023, 10:23:38 AM by NoraSana
content: Hello dear community!If this post is unwanted or breaks any rules, please delete this post.It really only fits in this category. I have a Binance NFT account and Binance's rules require that you need at least 10 followers to post your art there. I'm looking for followers. It is of course totally voluntary and I would be inestimably grateful if you would follow my account. Many thanks in advance!Here is the link to my account :https://www.binance.com/en/nft/my-nfts/collected/noransana-d67b4b99b6ee2bab67ccfc63aa15c54fHave a nice day and best wishes,Nora

comments.author: Helen Barton
comments.body: Maybe, for promoting your Binance NFT account, you may want to provide more information about your art and why people should follow your account. Why reason?, or etc.I think, by highlighting the value of your account, you may be able to attract more followers who are genuinely interested in your work. And continue that you end your reply with a friendly sign-off.
